title: <bdi>
description: The `<bdi>` HTML element isolates a span of text that might be formatted in a different directionality from the surrounding text.
content: The element that stands for Bi-Directional Isolation. It isolates a portion of text that might be formatted in a different direction (left-to-right or right-to-left) from its surrounding content, ensuring correct display in bi-directional text contexts.
